comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Alexander Hamilton Revell, a Chicago businessman; he died in 1931 when he fell from a 9th floor hotel window at age 73. www.encyclopedia.chicagohistory.org/pages/10307.html

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: We'll add a note with full name to the source catalog, with the caution of "probably" until more information turns up. Thanks!
